title: List of LSU Tigers head football coaches
summary: The LSU Tigers college football team represents Louisiana State University (LSU) in the West Division of the Southeastern Conference (SEC). The Tigers compete as part of the NCAA Division I Football Bowl Subdivision. The program has had 32Â head coaches since it began play during the 1893 season.[1] Since November 2021, Brian Kelly has served as LSU's head coach.[2]
